title: Cara Delevingne and Ashley Benson keep heads down on low-key date night
text:
Cara Delevingne and Ashley Benson kept their heads down on date night (Picture: Backgrid)

Cara Delevingne and girlfriend Ashley Benson kept their heads down as they enjoyed a cinema date.

The lovebirds – who started dating last year – were spotted out in Hollywood on a low-key night out.

And the model, 27, and Pretty Little Liars actress, 29, opted for very similar outfits as they attempted to go unnoticed for the evening.

Because couples who match together, stay together, right?

They both rocked the jeans and hoodie vibe, with Ashley finishing her look off with a white t-shirt and boots.

While Cara completed her outfit with simple black trainers.

Cara Delevingne and Ashley Benson went for matching looks for the night (Picture: Backgrid)

The pair started dating last year (Picture: Backgrid)

The Suicide Squad star recently opened up about their relationship for the first time, admitting Ashley makes her a ‘better’ person.

Lifting the lid on how they manage to make things work despite having very busy schedules, she said: ‘Long-distance relationships are always tough. We make it work though. We have to. And it definitely makes me a better, happier person,

Advertisement

Advertisement

Speaking to Net-A-Porter’s PorterEdit, she added: ‘I’d never truly let anyone in before, for fear of them leaving.

‘I never really trusted people, or felt worthy of it, and I always pushed them away.

Cara revealed Ashley ‘makes her better’ (Picture: Backgrid)

‘She’s the first person that has said: “You can’t push me away. I’m going to be nice to you, I love you.” I’m just like, “Wait, so all I have to do is just let you be nice to me? Why have I never done that before? Okay.”‘

Cashley are thought to have been dating for more than a year, but kept their romance largely out of the spotlight for months.

Until they were spotted carrying a sex bench into their home, that is…

And Kendall Jenner’s pal revealed she doesn’t feel like being secretive about their relationship, because she’s so proud.

‘I don’t want to be so secretive that people think I’m ashamed of anything. But I’ve never been in a relationship where things are so public, or where I posted pictures of someone else,’ she added to Elle Magazine. ‘This seemed different.

‘We had gotten to the point where we had kept it a secret, or at least not wanted attention, and now I feel like I’m not going to not be proud.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Couple goals or what?

description: Cara Delevingne and girlfriend Ashley Benson kept their heads down as they enjoyed a cinema date.
